QuestData.Title: Once in a Hundred Lifetimes
QuestData.Description: The time has come, wakener.$b$bThe council's power will combine to bring an end to the corrupted empress.$b$bThis ritual has not been witnessed in one hundred of your kind's lifetimes - and never by an outsider.$b$bIn exchange for your deeds on our behalf, I invite you to behold this great moment in our history.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Return to Klaxxi'vess and witness the re-making of our empire.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Klaxxi'va Ik in Klaxxi'vess.
QuestData.RewardText: Your arrival is timely, wakener.$b$bOur ritual is underway.
